评论详情: This is a beautiful set. But the pants are too short. I am 5’7 and I didn’t expect the length of the pants to be a problem.  The fabric is nice and the fit is great. The length of the pants make the set look awful.
Purchased for my daughter.  Fits great.  She loves it

I love this set more than any I own! However, I have a grease stain and bleach stains on it after 2 wears. My fault completely for cleaning house in it! I’m going to order another to replace it! I normally wear a large in tops and size 10 in bottoms, but a medium in this set fits me well at 5’6” 164 pounds.
Ordered this for travel & comfort and it's super soft and comfortable.  I plan on ordering this in more colors.

I have been eyeing the SPANX Air Essentials set for a looong time. I frequently travel for work and wanted a comfortable but polished look. This set delivered! I waited to review it because I wanted to get a wear and wash in. One drawback is that it is line dry. I washed it by itself on the delicate cycle, thre it in the dryer for 10 minutes and then hung it to dry. It kept it's shape and didn't shrink and washed well (no loose seams, fuzzballs, or material creasing/wrinkling). I stopped by the SPANX store on my way to my gate and compared the zippers, fabric, and drawstring and it is 90% identical. Also, the thicker fabric helps to camouflage any bumps, dimples, or imperfections :-) I was surprised at the high quality of this set and it definitely filled the need for a comfy casual trip outfit.
Really cozy for this blah winter weather. I got the black and so far wears/washes well.
Love it! Comfy and put together. I have shared the link with several friends and they love it, too! I have the brown and navy!
Very pleased with the quality.  Just as described.  The pants have pockets, which I love
Great set, nice fabric however the lathe was too big and the medium was too small.

Material was great also thick Love the color, but very disappointed my order came in on time, but it was used and had stained all over. I’ve sent message to seller and I still haven’t gotten a response.
If you’re 5’7”, these will likely be too short for you.  The top is good though.
So very soft & well made ! Love the color. Warm but cool enough to wear through different seasons .

Super cute. Love the fit. Love the color. Have worn this set four times and it is already pilling and the material is breaking down. Honestly, I didn’t expect it to last forever, but I definitely thought I’d get more than four washes out of it.
Fabric is great! I am 5'4', 135lbs. and bought a Medium..I could probably wear a Small but I like comfy clothes to have a loose fit.

I seldom leave reviews, because I order so mug. This outfit couldn’t be softer or more beautiful than it is. I encourage anyone,  looking for a nice, dressy sweatshirt to purchase this one. The colors are very rich and looks well made. For reference, I am 5”11 and weigh 160. The pants were almost long enough, but because I liked the outfit so much, I let out the seam and you can’t even tell. This outfit is one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon.
Feels comfortable but completely see through. Would like to try another color to make sure it’s not always see through. The white color I can’t wear in public. It also runs extremely large
I have loved the comfort of this lounge set until this week. Unfortunately, the drawstring has become unraveled and now looks tacky.
This is perfect in every way! The fit, (I ordered a small) the fabric and how it washes easily! I would order this in every color! I would give more stars if possible. No regrets getting this.

Love Love Love! I'm a curvy girl with a small waist so I  ordered a medium and a large. The medium is a perfect fit and the large is a cool oversized look. The waist is a little big on the large so I rolled it down. I got different colors and they give a different vibe,so I'm keeping both. They feel amazing and wash well.
Love everything about this set. Looks very high quality and expensive. I get a lot of compliments. Will be buying more in different colors.
Pants are soooooo long. Fabric is very nice thick and warm, quality is good, dress up on keep it casual very versatile, has some give in the fabric,  BUT.....THE PANTS ARE SO LONG!

Comfy fit + pockets are always a plus, so good to wear around the neighborhood and grocery shopping.  Unsure of the material, but a little thin and can't be put in the dryer.  I kept it but wouldn't purchase again.  I do not want to laundry a sweatsuit/tracksuit I have to lay flat to dry.

评论概述: Great to wear together and or seperate!
评论详情: There are many options in the market that have this same style. However, this is by far the best option. I recently ordered from a different company at around the same cost but I had to return because the material was stiff and the color was not as rich. Here is what I love about this sweatsuit, the material is silky, has an oversized look (I ordered the Large in dark brown), and i can mix and match. I like wearing the pieces together and separately. I did this out of caution but when washing the clothes, flip the clothes inside out, wash cold and air dry. I have this in black and the dark brown.
Purchased the tracksuit in green in size medium and I am obsessed! nice quality material and keeps you warm. I can't wait to wear it.
This is the perfect two piece outfit.  I love everything thing about it. The color, fabric, fit, and pricing. Ordering more colors.
It is very soft and looks more expensive than it is.

Great color and fit! Such a great material! Well made!

Fabric is wonderful.  Waist size is a bit too snug, as noted on previous reviews, even though it is adjustable to make smaller, not larger.  I will be returning the recommended XL for a L, as XL is just too loose, everywhere except the waist.  Very comfortable and I can’t wait for the right size.

Really big for the size
Very comfortable & looks great!

The material is thick and feels expensive. The height is perfect for tall girls like myself. I am 5'10 and average build and usually struggle to find comfy and cute clothes for the airport that fit me. This one fits the bill!
Top fits well, Pants too long and legs very wide. Fabric is great. Easy to travel with. Very comfortable. Quality very good.
Soft and comfortable

I love this sweatsuit! It is so cute and so comfy! The material is very soft. Love the length of the pants too. I always get compliments when I wear it. If you get the red color, be careful when washing because it does leak color onto other clothes. So wash with dark colors only.

评论概述: Quality Material & Stitching, Great Casual Look
评论详情: I've never been disappointed with the Anrabess brand. It is quality clothing at a reasonable price. This two-piece set is no exception. I'm 5-4, 140 lbs, with a curvy figure. The size small fit perfectly, although the waistband was a bit tight when pulling it on over my hips. However, once it was on, the waistband was comfortable. The sleeve length is a bit long, with the sleeve hitting above just where my thumb meets my palm, but I like that, especially when it's cold out. The inseam length is perfect -- no need to hem the pants. The pants also feature side pockets, and the top has a half zip that you can unzip all the way and show off a tanktop underneath, or zip all the way up for added warmth. I got it in Navy, but have now ordered a Medium in Black, just to compare. Perfect for running errands or a remote work day.
This set is really great quality and so comfortable! I’m 5ft 7in and 173lbs and got a large and it fits perfect and is a great length! Would definitely buy this in more colors!
This is so similar to the Spanx set (which I own so I know) but better because it has pockets! I’m 5’7” 160lbs and the medium is perfect. Pants length is great too!
Had to return it because a small was too big for my wife. Great quality. I would highly recommend.
Que producto tan bueno se lo he comprado a mi mamá y mi tía  donde se ponen la sudadera q es muy elegante y vestidora ya les he comprado de varios colores. Súper recomendada
Great for doing so many things I wear it all the time. The fabric is great thick. Well made. Color is fun a bright.
Soft Comfortable and the wide legs allow for sleek modern look. I loved the loose fit yet fits perfectly in all the right places.

At first glance it felt weird to see myself wearing this fit. But i gave it a another try and i style it the way the models do in the photos - this is key i also ordered a size up from my normal size for the extra baggage & style.
Did not like the color.
The sweatsuit itself is really well-made. It's soft and thick enough- not overly, but definitely not thin. I'm 5'3" and 134 lbs. The small fit fine but was a little shorter than I expected.
Great quality and so soft. Will be ordering another one. Petite friendly
Love the quality and comfort of this set!
Shirt is a little short. Fabric is thick but feels cold (synthetic). I prefer something cotton or fleece

I got this on sale Cyber Monday. It is a dupe for a Spanx top and bottom. Maybe not as nice but pretty nice and way cheaper.  I got XL and pants a bit short on me 5'9 but still wearable. I really like the top and have work that with a skirt.

I love the fabric and cut and everything about this set EXCEPT that the waist is too tight! I do not understand why the manufacturer would make the waist so small when it is elastic and has a drawstring for adjustment. Otherwise, the medium fits perfectly. I ordered a large to see if it would fit better, but it is too baggy overall (although the waist on the large fits more comfortably, it is still too snug for athleisure). Was hoping to wear these for travel, but the waist is a problem. For reference, I am 153 pounds and 5 ft 5 1/2 in tall. This set might be best for those with a tiny waist or those who have not had children.
Love everything about it. The fit the feel in general everything.
Ordered White and although I do like the style and fit, it is definitely not white, more of a cream or off white. Will keep tho, because it is comfortable, just wish it was white!
This is the best outfit that I’ve seen in a long time. It fits well and the material is great.

Love everything about this, I bought it for travel and it was great! One thing to note....they need to put pockets on the top! I'm constantly trying to put my hands in the pockets and there aren't any. There are pockets in the pants though! Still love it!
I LOVE THIS SO MUCH I AM BUYING ANOTHER IN A DIFFERENT COLOR. TRUE TO SIZE, GREAT QUALITY, AND IT LOOKS STYLISH.
Love the material

As others have reported, the material is soft and comfortable. I purchased the olive color one. The green looked great, the material was soft and conformable, and I loved wearing. My one annoyance - which it does not warrant a less of a star - is that you have to let it air dry. I will be getting other colors!

While the fabric is a soft, smooth type, I've found that it stains easily and stains are somewhat difficult to remove.  After having and wearing the set a few times now, I wouldn't readily recommend it.  There are better sets out there.

评论概述: Very comfortable, great colors and price
评论详情: I love these outfits! They are great casual outfits that I can wear with sneakers, UGGS or Crocs. Beautiful colors. They are great for shopping, working from home and travel. I have 4 sets. I’ve also bought as Christmas gifts for my family and for a sick auntie who is bound to her wheelchair and wanted to be cute for visitors. They wash and wear very well. They aren’t the same as the SPANX Air Essentials that I own but they are a close second, especially for the price.
I actually love the style and the fit of this sweatsuit however it reeks of perfume. I want it for upcoming trip so I am going to wash it and hope that the smell comes out.
But very cute. Disappointed that when going to exchange for a smaller size, the price went up 20$ so looks like we will just be returning it instead of exchanging it
